thread.title: Bookies Slash Odds On Rooney Moving To China Within Days
thread.title_full: Bookies Slash Odds On Rooney Moving To China Within Days

title: Bookies Slash Odds On Rooney Moving To China Within Days
text:
Bookies Slash Odds On Rooney Moving To China Within Days Sat Feb 18 2017 11:42:00  42:00 GMT+0000 (GMT) Kieran Spratt Kieran Spratt in theoddsbible 
Wayne Rooney could make a shock move to China within ten days according to Ladbrokes. 
The bookies have slashed the odds of Rooney making a last-gasp switch to the Chinese Super League before their transfer window closes on the 28th of Feb to just 5/1, from 20/1. 
And should the deal fall down for this window, it's now just evens he makes the move east at any point in his career. 
Alex Donohue of Ladbrokes said: "The betting had always hinted at Rooney making the move to China at some point, but out of nowhere the odds of him making a shock switch within days have collapsed." 
Ladbrokes latest betting 
Wayne Rooney to sign for a Chinese club before February 28 - 5/1Wayne Rooney to play in the Chinese Super League in his career - evens Promoted links from around the web Kieran Spratt
